text: Sergej Kraigher (30 May 1914 â€“ 17 January 2001) was a Yugoslav communist politician from Slovenia. He served as the President of Yugoslavia from 1981 to 1982. During World War II, he fought in the Yugoslav Resistance Movement. Category:1914 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Yugoslavian communist politicians Category:Presidents of Yugoslavia
title: Sergej Kraigher
